messages.content: As a disabled mother of three, who settled in the Garnock Valley over 30 years ago, I know very well the issues facing this diverse constituency, from unemployment to farming, from factories to tourism, and if elected I will work hard to represent my constituents, making sure that North Ayrshire's voice is heard in the heart of Westminster. A determined democrat, opposed to the EU, I believe that the UK's future should not be decided by an out of touch political class, but by its people.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a disabled mother of three, who settled in the Garnock Valley over 30 years ago, I know very well the issues facing this diverse constituency, from unemployment to farming, from factories to tourism, and if elected I will work hard to represent my constituents, making sure that North Ayrshire's voice is heard in the heart of Westminster.

images.caption: Sharon McGonigle standing up for Real Change
